mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION (user_id, type, message, is_read, created_at, related_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type, typeHandler=kr.co.fitzcode.admin.handler.NotificationTypeHandler}, #{message}, #{read}, #{createdAt}, #{relatedId})
